about_the_game:
Trizon is a rogue-like deckbuilding game featuring a variety of hand-drawn, animated card illustrations. Players take on the role of an escapee relentlessly pushing forward to uncover the truth and ultimately find a way out. The game combines auto-battler mechanics, where creatures attack on their own, with instant-effect spell cards. Battles are fast-paced and dynamic, set against a simple and restrained art style, making both in-battle and out-of-battle decisions equally significant and thought-provoking.

Players can...


  • Use creatures and spells to control the battlefield, defeating all enemy creatures to secure victory.
  • Fuse any two cards in your deck to create completely overpowered single-card combos.
  • Merge countless creatures to cultivate your own unique, ultimate fusion monster.
  • Plan your route and take risks to achieve greater rewards.
  • Anticipate the flow of battle, triggering a series of fully automated chain reactions.
  • Craft infinite loops, defeating any opponent in a single turn with limitless combos.
  • Encounter adorable card illustrations, making your adventure feel less lonely.
